option7.name: EESAVE
option7.desc: Preserve EEPROM memory through the Chip Erase cycle

case1.message: These fuse settings will disable the ISP interface!

case2.message: Enabling DEBUGWIRE will make the ISP interface inaccessible!

case3.message: Disabling external reset will make the ISP interface inaccessible!

case4.message: Using this clock option together with the CKDIV8 fuse will disable further programming!

case5.message: Using this clock option together with the CKDIV8 fuse will disable further programming!

case6.message: Using this clock option together with the CKDIV8 fuse will disable further programming!
